articles.title: Blow for England with young spinner to depart India - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The teenager will depart India and head home to India due to a family matter.
articles.content:
England released a statement on social media just prior to the start of the fourth Test in Ranchi, declaring the spinner would return home and no replacement would be named.
